long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our mission at Howardgoods.com is to help women create curves with our high quality made in America, highly effective waist trainers and shapewear that will exude confidence even in the most introverted woman wearing every outfit. Our waist cinchers, control bodysuits and other slimmer solutions have been perfectly crafted to define your silhouette, amplify your figure and spotlight your best features. Our well designed set of bodyshapers will immediately begin to sculpt your midsection through compression, while providing support to the back and also lifting the bust and as a result, creating an overall slimmer and curvier silhouette version of you. You will begin to experience dramatic results with gym-ready waist cinchers that also increases thermal activity and perspiration.

We only carry the best waist training products which we couple with great prices. From maximum-control cinchers that create stunning transfigurations, to minimal-control shapers that smooth your silhouette, there is a body shaper for everyone. Manage your midsection, round your bottom, boost your bust or bounce back from a baby body; no matter what the goal, Shapewear City is the right destination.
